author: Hayden Field
title: The AI industry is running on FOMO
description: For Big Tech, a penny invested in AI is a penny earned… Maybe. After an indeterminate amount of time. Investors hope. On earnings calls last week, Amazon, Google, Microsoft, and Meta reported more than $350 billion this year on capital expenditures, or longer…
content: At least according to Big Techs latest earnings calls. At least according to Big Techs latest earnings calls. by Hayden FieldClose Hayden Field Posts from t… [+8768 chars]
